summary:
## Copa América: A Soccer Celebration

The Copa América is South America's biggest soccer tournament, held every four years. It's the oldest continental tournament in the world! Teams from South America compete, and sometimes, teams from other continents are invited too. Argentina is the most successful team, winning 16 times.

The tournament has 12 teams usually, including 10 from South America and 2 guests. Recently, it expanded to 16 teams, bringing in more countries from North America.
title: Copa América
